name: KMEA Group
tag_list: telecommunications, business-strategy, business, marketing, assessment, optimization, telehealth, tv500sp, videophone, mpls, telehealthgear
overview:
KMEA Group provides IT Assessment, Integration and Optimization services.

  • KMEA (d/b/a) a partnership formed to provide solutions to state and federal governments.
  • North American Communications, a consulting firm specializing in Telecommunications
  • Nationwide Telecom Services, a telecommunications VAR and technical services company

Together or as separate entities, KMEA Group will help clients improve productivity, reduce costs and solve business related problems.
